Generation I.Red: Very competitive, this Pok é mon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Very competitive, this Pok é mon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
Generation I.Yellow: Just loves to run. If it sees something faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.
Generation I.Stadium: Unable to restrain itself from running after fast trains or cars. Capable of reaching 150 mph at full speed.

Generation II.Gold: At full gallop, its four hooves barely touch the ground because it moves so incredibly fast.
Generation II.Silver: With incredible acceleration, it reaches its top speed of 150 mph after running just ten steps.
Generation II.Crystal: It just loves to gallop. The faster it goes, the longer the swaying flames of its mane will become.
Generation II.Stadium 2: At full gallop, its four hooves barely touch the ground because it moves so incredibly fast. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) With incredible acceleration, it reaches its top speed of 150 mph after running just ten steps. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pok é mon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph .
Generation III.Sapphire: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pok é mon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph .
Generation III.Emerald: It usually canters casually in the fields and plains. But once a Rapidash turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph .
Generation III.FireRed: It can gallop at a top speed of 150 miles per hour . It can race as fast as a bullet train while ablaze.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Very competitive, this Pok é mon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

Generation IV.Diamond: It gallops at nearly 150 mph . With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
Generation IV.Pearl: It has astounding acceleration. From a standstill, it can reach top speed within 10 steps.
Generation IV.Platinum: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
Generation IV.HeartGold: At full gallop, its four hooves barely touch the ground because it moves so incredibly fast.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: With incredible acceleration, it reaches its top speed of 150 mph after running just 10 steps.

Generation V.Black: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
Generation V.White: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
Generation V.Black 2: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.
Generation V.White 2: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.

Generation VI.X: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
Generation VI.Y: It gallops at nearly 150 mph . With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pokémon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph .
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Rapidash usually can be seen casually cantering in the fields and plains. However, when this Pokémon turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph .

Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Just loves to run. If it sees something faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Just loves to run. If it sees something faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.

Generation VIII.Sword: Little can stand up to its psycho cut . Unleashed from this Pokémon's horn, the move will punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.
Generation VIII.Shield: Brave and prideful, this Pokémon dashes airily through the forest, its steps aided by the psychic power stored in the fur on its fetlocks.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It gallops at nearly 150 mph . With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It has astounding acceleration. From a standstill, it can reach top speed within 10 steps.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Fiery mane aglow, Rapidash darts like an arrow across the land. This prodigiously swift creature can traverse the vast region of Hisui in a day and a half.
